headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Double Rewards on Biker Sell Missions, Work, and Challenges
content:
For some the heat rippling off the road, the chemical cocktail of asphalt mingling with engine fumes, the roar barely contained by a vintage chassis, the tight embrace of a pair of skintight chaps - these are the hallmarks of a true stunt afficionado.

These leather types will be able to earn a killing off Biker Sell Missions and MC Work & Challenges - all paying out double GTA$ and RP until April 7th.
